channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Connections
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Connections

item.title: CVE-2019-4403|2024-09-17T00:46:24.965Z -- ibm -- connections
item.description: IBM Connections 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 162264.

item.title: CVE-2018-1935|2024-09-17T01:01:51.214Z -- ibm -- connections
item.description: IBM Connections 5.0, 5.5, and 6.0 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from invalid request error messages. IBM X-Force ID: 153315.
